ssot__BenefitAction__dlm.name: Benefit Action
ssot__BenefitAction__dlm.description: The Benefit Action DMO represents actions triggered when a program benefit is assigned to a loyalty program member.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Benefit Action DMO.

ssot__BenefitActionProcessTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the benefit action process type, such as loyalty or rebates.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Description__c.description: A description of the benefit action.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__IsBenefitExpirationAllowed__c.description: An indicator if the benefits expire.

ssot__IsBenefitUpdateAllowed__c.description: An indicator if updates can be made to benefits.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.
